description: The "Secure Design and Development Cyber Security Capability Maturity Model" (SD2-CM2) allows electrical system managers to assess the maturity of their cybersecurity systems, including designs reflecting internet of things devices (IOT).  The content provides best practices in the field and users can assess the level of their designs. Modules are "Content" and "Infrastructure"
name: Secure Design and Development Cyber Security Capability Maturity Model” (SD2-CM2)
